author: costin
msg: 2 small utils, used to run modeler whith no external dependencies
The code is taken from jakarta-tomcat-connectors, with minimal
JMX doesn't use a lot of advanced introspection - and the current
implementation does that directly ( the only dep on beanutils is via
digester ). IntrospectionUtils is used mostly for Dom.
Note that a lot of code in IU is not used - but I preffer to keep

author: costin
msg: This task loades mbean descriptors. Pass the resource name, for debug
I don't know if this is really needed, in most cases mbeans-descriptors.xml
should be located in the same package or in a parent.

author: costin
msg: Consistent names, removed debugging println, refactored Arg.

author: costin
